name: OST Energy
overview: OST Energy is an independent engineering consultancy specialising in renewable technical advisory work. Our team has vast experience across a number of different technologies including wind, bioenergy, solar photovoltaics and concentrated solar power plants across the globe. We work for private equity funds, banks, owners, developers and utilities on all aspects of projects from green field developments, to asset managing existing operational plants. We have undertaken assignments on over 2 GW of projects across the globe (including projects in Spain, Italy, France, Portugal, Bulgaria, the Czech Republic, Greece, the UK, the Middle East, India, Australia and the USA) and currently we have offices in the UK and Italy and soon we will be opening in the U.S and South Africa We pride ourselves on our work ethic, flexibility and ability to deliver expert advice in a concise, clear manner. OST Energy is a multi-award winning company. We were named the 2012 Finance Monthly magazine ‘UK Renewable Advisory Firm of the Year’. We have also held the title of ‘UK Technical Advisor of the year’ in the ACQ Global Awards for the past two years.
